Daytona_Beach.Ocean Center:
Ocean Center is a convention center located in Daytona Beach, Florida. It is the fifth largest convention center in Florida.


== About ==
The Ocean Center features 205,000 square feet (19,000 m2) of prime meeting space; 42,000 square feet (3,900 m2) of exhibit space at the main arena, 12,000 square feet (1,100 m2) of space in the Ballroom and 32,000 square feet (3,000 m2) of meeting rooms.
